about_the_game:
Enter the Ultimate Open-World Driving Experience

Buckle up and get ready to conquer the roads in this thrilling open-world driving game, set across 9 islands where chaos and speed reign supreme. Whether you're looking to race against AI, enjoy a leisurely free drive, or dive into high-octane arcade action, Jack's 510 Racing has it all!

Game Modes:

Street Racing: Take on AI opponents in intense street races. Use skill, speed, and strategy to dominate the roads.

Arcade Mode: Push your driving skills to the limit in action-packed sessions. Race against time by hitting checkpoints to earn more seconds on the clock, while causing mayhem with pedestrian and car collisions to rack up points. Watch out for the police—they won’t make it easy for you!

Free Drive: Explore the open world at your own pace. Cruise through scenic landscapes, discover hidden areas, or just enjoy the ride.

Will add new game modes that players request!

Key Features:

Destructive Driving: In Jack's 510 Racing, everything is fair game. Cause chaos and destruction to boost your score while evading relentless police chases.

Upgradeable Cars: Customize your ride with a variety of visual upgrades and performance enhancements. Make your car truly yours.

Steam Online Leaderboards: Compete against players around the world and see how your skills stack up. Will you make it to the top?

VR Mode & Widescreen Support: Experience fully immersive driving in VR or take advantage of widescreen monitors for a stunning visual experience.

Online Radio: Tune in to in-game radio stations, or play the game completely offline.

Multiple Control Options: Play with keyboard and mouse, gamepad, or step up your game with steering wheel support (tested with Logitech wheels).

Whether you're in it for the thrill of racing, the freedom of exploration, or the chaos of arcade destruction, Jack's 510 Racing offers endless replayability. With its combination of upgradeable cars, online leaderboards, and heart-pounding police chases, every session feels fresh and exciting.

short_description: Destructive Open World Street Racing. Earn points by hitting pedestrians or winning races. Use points to buy or upgrade cars. Various game modes, like Death Race.
